definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Woollen fabrics shrink in the wash.
The article discusses several requests on the style and charcter of worsted goods.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡述了毛織物的風格及特徵的幾點基本要求。

sentences.english: This article discusses the development of nanometer intellectualized thermoregulation wool fabric.
sentences.chinese: 採用微膠囊納米技術開發智能調溫毛織物。

sentences.english: Synthetic detergents or soaps containing alkaline builders are used to scour wool.
sentences.chinese: 具有鹼性組分的合成滌劑或肥皂適用於對毛織物煮練。

sentences.english: Figure 5 is a process flow chart of wool and worsted fabric finishing oprations.
sentences.chinese: 圖5系粗紡和精紡毛織物整理加工的流程圖。

sentences.english: Based on this principle, it has developed the worsted wool fabrics with three dimension printing.
sentences.chinese: 基於這一原理，開發了三維印花毛織物。

sentences.english: This soap won't shrink woolen goods.
sentences.chinese: 這種肥皂不會使毛織物收縮。

sentences.english: Wool usually damages if washed in hot water.
sentences.chinese: 毛織物用熱水洗一般會受損。

sentences.english: Figure 4 outlines the operations that take place in woolen and worsted fabric manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 圖4概略表示出粗紡和精紡毛織物生產的工藝流程。

sentences.english: Figure 5 is a process flow chart of wool and worsted fabric finishing operations.
sentences.chinese: 圖5系粗紡和精紡毛織物整理加工的流程圖。
